name: Python for the Life Sciences
tagline: A gentle introduction to Python for life scientists
body:
### **Python for the Life Sciences**
From here you can download or browse the code for the book [_Python for the Life Sciences_](http://pythonforthelifesciences.com) released by @amberbiology. The book is available via [Leanpub](http://leanpub.com/pythonforthelifesciences)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
